item.title: How to Set Up a Hugo Blog Post
item.description: This tutorial covers: 1. How to Create a New Blog Post 2. How to Add Images to the Blog Post 3. How to Add Other Media to the Blog Post How to Create a New Blog Post Step 1: Navigate to the root of your Hugo website folder, then run the following command: hugo new content posts/nameofyourpost/index.md Step 2: Open the content/posts/nameofyourpost/index.md file in your favorite code editor. Go to the front matter, or section in between the “—” triple hyphens, and edit the following: For title, type the title of the blog post.
